artists.name: AURA-7
artists.promptBase: bioluminescent organic shapes, flowing liquid light, deep underwater atmosphere, glowing tendrils

description.ko: 숨 쉬는 자연의 빛, 유기적 생명의 흐름
description.en: Breathing light of nature, flow of organic life

artists.name: KURO-X
artists.promptBase: black and white geometric abstraction, glitch art aesthetics, scanlines, sharp angles, monochrome complexity

description.ko: 질서 속 혼돈, 파편이 만드는 완벽한 균형
description.en: Chaos within order, perfect balance created by fragments

artists.name: NEON-V
artists.promptBase: cyberpunk cityscape colors, neon pink and blue, rainy reflections, futuristic urban texture

description.ko: 네온과 금속, 미래 도시의 디지털 낭만
description.en: Neon and metal, digital romance of a futuristic city

artists.name: FLORA-9
artists.promptBase: fractal flowers, blooming digital petals, soft pastels, nature reclaiming technology

description.en: Spring of a digital garden that blooms forever

artists.name: ECHO-0
artists.promptBase: visualized soundwaves, vibrating frequencies, minimal lines reacting to invisible sound

description.ko: 침묵 속 울림, 소리의 시각적 공명
description.en: Resonance in silence, visual consonance of sound

artists.name: VOID-3
artists.promptBase: deep space nebula, stars dust, infinite void, cosmic horror majesty

description.ko: 심연의 별, 무한 우주의 고요한 장엄
description.en: Stars of the abyss, silent majesty of the infinite universe

artists.name: TERRA-1
artists.promptBase: topographic maps, rough textures of rocks and soil, earthy tones, sediment layers

description.ko: 흙과 바위, 시간이 새긴 대지의 서사
description.en: Earth and rock, narrative of the land carved by time

artists.name: AQUA-5
artists.promptBase: bioluminescence in deep sea, fluid dynamics, bubbles, translucent jellyfish forms

description.ko: 심해의 빛, 투명한 생명의 평온한 춤
description.en: Light of the deep sea, peaceful dance of transparent life

artists.name: PRISM-2
artists.promptBase: light dispersion, rainbow caustics, glass refraction, chromatic aberration

description.ko: 빛의 굴절, 무지개가 담긴 순수 에너지
description.en: Refraction of light, pure energy containing the rainbow
